participant_1.name: Alex
participant_1.personality: Creative and laid-back, enjoys music and spending time with loved ones.
participant_1.background: my pets name is charlie. i produce music for artists. my favourite food is pizza. i drive a 2015 honda civic.

participant_2.name: Linda
participant_2.personality: Nurturing and reflective, loves sharing stories about family and enjoys crafting.
participant_2.background: i'm retired and living the great life. i've amazing children and grandchildren. i had cancer but its gone now. i can sew my own clothes.
